idea:
We have incorporated our firm in October 2020. As a company we are looking to promote reusable cleaning products, SAY NO TO SINGLE USE PLASTIC BOTTLES. As we come across cleaning products around us : Hand Soap, Glass Cleaners, Floor Cleaners and So on we use tons of plastics which needs to be disposed in one way or the other. At ProcureX we deliver one time forever bottle with no water and tablets / pods for your use. You don't have to PAY FOR WATER. You only have to open our bottle + Add Tablet + Add Water (let it dissolve) & USE.  JUST ADD TAP WATER.


You can keep ordering refills for next orders. Refills delivered to you are plastic free.
name: PROCUREX SOURCING LLP
